content:
I think we've covered all the essential topics! You're well-prepared for Governors Ball, and I'm sure you'll have an amazing time.

If you have any more questions or need further recommendations, feel free to ask me anytime. Otherwise, I'll just say... enjoy the music, the atmosphere, and the company of your friends! Make some unforgettable memories at Governors Ball!

(And who knows, maybe we'll chat again after the festival, and you can share your experiences and favorite moments with me!)
